elements.name: payersUnitNumber
elements.description:
For ACH Debit participants this is the number provided by CBP during the step-up process with Pay.gov that identifies the bank account is to be debited.

ACH Debit Payer's Unit Number is mandatory for Daily and Periodic Daily Statement authorizations. ACH Credit participants will space fill this field for Periodic Daily Statement authorizations and SO Daily Statement authorizations.

elements.name: paymentTypeCode
elements.description:
A code of 01 indicates the payment type is for a CBP Periodic Daily Statement.

A code of 02 indicates the payment is for a CBP Daily Statement.

elements.name: statementFiler
elements.description: A code representing the filer of the Statement.

elements.name: statementNumber
elements.description: The number that identifies the Statement.

elements.name: paymentAmount
elements.description: A value representing the amount of the Statement. This amount must be identical to the total Daily or Periodic Daily Statement amount and must also be provided for statements with a zero amount. Two decimal places are implied. If the amount is a whole number, the two low-order (cents) positions contain zeroes. For ACH Debit participants this is the amount of money that is to be electronically debited from the payer's bank account.

elements.name: negationCode
elements.description: Must be Y to request a negation of an accepted ACH Debit Authorization/Entry Summary Presentation. Otherwise, space fill.

elements.name: negationDate
elements.description: The negation date in month, day, year format (MMDDYY). Must be sent when negation code = Y. Otherwise, space fill.
